Author: jilly.
Title: Good value and pretty!  SLOW TO RECEIVE.
Body: Very pretty. I removed the tab and it started right up.  Easy to set date.  I haven’t worn it yet but looks great and is running fine.  Much better than I expected for the price I paid!  Only draw back is how long it took to get it.  That was ridiculous.

Title: how thin it is
Body: not thin at all

Author: Carlos S.
Title: Not bad for the price I love mine
Body: I ain't going to lie it's a cheap watch but it really looks good for for the price that I paid for it can't complain and I ain't going to lie I actually love the watch I'm on profile picture on Amazon you can actually see me wearing it answer the makers of the watch this model''' Good Job ''''

Author: odette loureiro
Title: Great expensive watch
Body: Big watch piece.  Easy to see and inexpensive.  Not heavy on wrist and does what it is supposed to do.  Keep time.

Author: Robert Little
Title: Love it.
Body: I like different watches & this one is unique. Only drawback is the cheap band which I'll replace eventually.

Title: You get what you pay for
Body: It’s cheap looking and poor quality

Author: R. Nichols
Title: Low quality matches the low price
Body: This is a very poor quality watch. I thought I was getting a great deal based on the picture, but when I handled the watch I saw how cheap it is.

Author: Sfriedis
Title: Very stylish watch!
Body: Please let me know how I may buy more of these!

Author: Jerry M
Title: Broke Real Quick
Body: The glass bezel broke after I owned this watch about a month. I looked down and it was shattered. Also the little piece that held down the un-used part of the end of the watch band would never stay in place. I guess I got what I paid for but it did look nice for the month I got to wear it.

Author: Miellyb
Title: Waste of money
Body: Glass broke same day it came.Very poor quality.Had a new glass in then the colour fade within 3 days.Its waste of money.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: No disappointment here :-)
Body: Much better quality than I thought!  My husband likes a slim line watch and he’s enjoying it!

Author: Raymond S. Galinski
Title: What good is a wristwatch that doesn’t fit a wrist
Body: Nice looking watch. But you can’t wear it because the strap is made for a child not a grown man. They’re made in China for very skinny people
